name: Shuffleboard
overview:
Shuffleboard was produced by Midway Manufacturing Co. in 1978.

Shuffleboard is a simulation of a shuffle board. Two players (or one versus the computer) slide pucks on a field using a large trackball. The goal is to make them land in fields which are worth different amounts of points. Once the pucks are in a field they can still be knocked away by the next player.
